item.description:
I missed last week's final edition of Trivia at Snookers, but have been told that the new place to be is Fatty McGee's on Monday nights. We'll have a pool day in the near future to spend the final 2nd place trivia prize.

The Trivia game starts at 9PM. I'll be there around 8:30 to find a table big enough for the group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me to have a meetup sign.
item.why: Great conversation, fun people, a fun game, good music (usually), and an over the top trivia master.
item.name: Following Tucker for Trivia @ Fatty McGees
